name: Water Obstacle Course Runner
description:
Put on helmet and flak jacket, get ready to run over slippery path filled with insane obstacles to make you fall in water pool. Play most amazing water obstacle course runner game. Choose crazy characters like school teacher, police man, army officer and more. And enjoy playing this obstacle course based fun game. Enjoy playing this fun game in your apple phone and tablets.

Features:
Colorful environment
Smooth controls
Multiple characters
Challenging game play
